insert ignore into ivvs_source_data ( uuid, sbbh, zqmj, clfl, hpzl, hphm, xzqh, wfdd, lddm, ddms, wfdz, wfsj, wfsj1, wfxw, scz, bzz, zpsl, zpwjm, zpstr1, zpstr2, zpstr3, zpstr4, wfspdz, ilocalremote, createtime, fxdm, gxbm, yhdm, sjly, cdh, cjh, qjcssj, datasource, status, wfxwmc, sfjtp, clpp, csys, sfhhdj, Xh, cdbh, hpys, xsfx, cllx, fzjg, jdcsyr, jtfs, zsxzqh, dh, lxfs, xcfw, jdzt, jdjg, alg_status, alg_uuid, sxjbh, gp01, alg_err_code, view_id, city_code ) values

insert into ivvs_source_data ( uuid, sbbh, zqmj, clfl, hpzl, hphm, xzqh, wfdd, lddm, ddms, wfdz, wfsj, wfsj1, wfxw, scz, bzz, zpsl, zpwjm, zpstr1, zpstr2, zpstr3, zpstr4, wfspdz, ilocalremote, createtime, fxdm, gxbm, yhdm, sjly, cdh, cjh, qjcssj, datasource, status, wfxwmc, sfjtp, clpp, csys, sfhhdj, Xh, cdbh, hpys, xsfx, cllx, fzjg, jdcsyr, jtfs, zsxzqh, dh, lxfs, xcfw, jdzt, jdjg, alg_status, alg_uuid, sxjbh, gp01, alg_err_code, view_id, city_code ) values ( #{uuid}, #{sbbh}, #{zqmj}, #{clfl}, #{hpzl}, #{hphm}, #{xzqh}, #{wfdd}, #{lddm}, #{ddms}, #{wfdz}, #{wfsj}, #{wfsj1}, #{wfxw}, #{scz}, #{bzz}, #{zpsl}, #{zpwjm}, #{zpstr1}, #{zpstr2}, #{zpstr3}, #{zpstr4}, #{wfspdz}, #{ilocalremote}, #{createtime}, #{fxdm}, #{gxbm}, #{yhdm}, #{sjly}, #{cdh}, #{cjh}, #{qjcssj}, #{datasource}, #{status}, #{wfxwmc}, #{sfjtp}, #{clpp}, #{csys}, #{sfhhdj}, #{xh}, #{cdbh}, #{hpys}, #{xsfx}, #{cllx}, #{fzjg}, #{jdcsyr}, #{jtfs}, #{zsxzqh}, #{dh}, #{lxfs}, #{xcfw}, #{jdzt}, #{jdjg}, #{algStatus}, #{algUuid}, #{sxjbh}, #{gp01}, #{algErrCode}, #{viewId}, #{cityCode} )
